content: by crocheting this basket with two strands of yarn in contrasting colors we get this beautiful salt and pepper marled effect **materials** caron® one pound™ 16 oz/453 6 g 812 yds/742 m * contrast a soft grey mix 10616 1 ball * contrast b dark grey mix 10618 1 ball **note** basket is worked with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout
